text: ennal nam'mil ninnulla satyam vannettiyappeal avar parannu: "musakku labhiccatupealulla drstantam ivanu kittattatent?" ennal musakku drstantam kittiyittum janam addehatte tallipparayukayalle ceytat? avar parannu: "parasparam pintunakkunna rantu jalavidyakkar!" avar itrakuti parannu: "nannalita itineyeakke tallipparayunnu
